dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but did you see this? They've divided the city into three parking zones! Like, three!

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I know! And it's all part of this, um, Astana thing.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The process of transferring paid parking in Astana to state control is nearing completion, Deputy Akim Yersin Otebayev announced.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! The state is taking it over!

dialogue_turns.text: The state! And they're putting in cameras, like, everywhere, apparently.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the cameras! And a new administrative system, apparently. For, uh, better enforcement.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The reform includes the installation of cameras, the introduction of a new administrative system... A state-owned company will take over paid parking management, enforcing stricter regulations to improve traffic flow and enforcement.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And they're going to start with the, uh, most congested areas first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And they're going to start with the, uh, most congested areas first.
